title: 12 essence away from pulsefire ezreal
body: Guys I need help, I really want to enchant pulsefire ez but I'm 12 essence away :c I waited so long. Hope riot helps me out. {{champion:81}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: winning rotating game queue matches seems to give one every win
If it was possible i would have gave you the amount of essence that you need.
Unfortunately, we can't gift out any essence :( It sucks being that close, yet so far.  Keep playing and earning chests and key fragments.  You should be over the top shortly! :)
